name: Overview
main:
Assistance needs due to armed conflict and frequent natural disasters include food, healthcare, and protection.? Since January the increase in the number of people internally displaced by conflict and the influx of returnees from Pakistan and Iran in the year 2016, shelter and WASH needs have increased significantly. 7.4 million people are in need of humanitarian assistance. However, the high level of insecurity constrains access. ?

INFORM measures Afghanistan’s risk of humanitarian crisis and disaster to be very high, at 7.7/10. ?
latest_developments_past:
09/10: As of October, the ICRC has taken the decision to reduce its presence in Afghanistan. The offices of Maimana and Kunduz will be closed, while its sub-delegation in Mazar-i-Sharif will be downsized. ?

03/10: Forty health facilities have closed down in Uruzgan province following threats from armed groups, restricting healthcare access to over 420,000 people.?
